SELECT s.sg_id AS sgId, s.mb_id AS mbId, s.title, s.content, s.view_count AS viewCount, s.created_at AS createdAt, s.modified_at AS modifiedAt, -- 답변 테이블 데이터 가져오기 sa.content AS answerContent, sa.created_at AS answerCreatedAt FROM suggestions s LEFT JOIN suggestion_answer sa ON s.sg_id = sa.sg_id WHERE s.sg_id = #{sgId} -- 답변이 여러 개일 경우 최신 답변 1개만 가져오기 (옵션) ORDER BY sa.sg_ans_id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO suggestion_answer ( sg_id, mb_id, content, parent_id, created_at, modified_at ) VALUES ( #{sgId}, #{mbId}, #{content}, NULL, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE suggestion_answer SET content = #{content}, modified_at = NOW() WHERE sg_id = #{sgId} ORDER BY sg_ans_id DESC LIMIT 1
